ygData.subject: RE: Skills Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Quite true, I wish we got track at an earlier level when we were still hunting in outdoor zones for things other than Giants, but oh well.  I think Track and
ygData.messageBody:
Quite true, I wish we got track at an earlier level when we were still
hunting in outdoor zones for things other than Giants, but oh well. I think
Track and Safe Fall are both quite useful and I look forward to them, forage
is useful to me only because I am a baker, the others? Even if they
implement more traps and locks in Kunark I doubt it will help as the traps
and locks you will find at the level we get those skills will surely be so
far beyond our measly caps that we will be useless at attempting them. If
this isn't the case then the locks and traps will be worse then trivial to
rogues of those levels.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 10:18 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skills Survey


From: <kim@...>

On Thu, 11 Nov 1999, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
>
> Which of the following skills do you use regularly?
> Forage, Sneak, Safe Fall, Hide, Disarm Traps, Tracking, Pick Locks

You do realize people who aren't high enough level to have
some of these skills are going to say they don't use them
regularly? Tracking is probably the most useful skill we get,
but it's a L35 skill so most people will say they won't use
it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
